alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 11:12AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY, JANUARY 15... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Augusta. * WHEN...Until Saturday, January 15. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Thousands of acres of farm ground flooded. County roads on both sides of the river are flooded, including County Road 871 and 899. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 29.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Thursday was 29.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, January 14. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 29.9 feet on 03/31/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date White River Augusta 26.0 29.6 Thu 10 AM 29.8 29.8 28.9 30.0 12 AM 1/08 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
